article_title: As Walgreens Cuts Costs, Store Corners May Change

article_metadata.description: With $1 billion in costs to cut as part of its merger with Alliance Boots, Walgreen Co. (WAG) is preparing for potential store design changes and new retail locations to reduce expenses and boost under-performing operations. The largest drugstore chain in the U.S. earlier this week hinted at such potential changes [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
